trans-unit.source: Contains a generic column mapping for an object that inherits from <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataAdapter"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
A <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> enables you to use column names in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that are different from those in the data source.
The `DataAdapter` uses the mapping to match the columns when the tables in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or data source are updated.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> class with the specified source column name and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name to map to.
The case-sensitive column name from a data source.
The column name, which is not case sensitive, from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
Gets or sets the name of the column within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
The name of the column within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
The name is not case sensitive.

Gets a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> from the given <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn"></xref> property.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to get the column from.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the data column.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
A data column.

A static version of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.GetDataColumnBySchemaAction(System.Data.DataTable,System.Type,System.Data.MissingSchemaAction)"></xref> that can be called without instantiating a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
The case-sensitive column name from a data source.
The column name, which is not case sensitive, from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
An instance of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
The data type for the column being mapped.
Determines the action to take when existing <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> schema does not match incoming data.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from.
The name is case-sensitive.
The case-sensitive name of the column in the data source.
Converts the current <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.SourceColumn"></xref> name to a string.
The current <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.SourceColumn"></xref> name as a string.
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.ICloneable.Clone%2A>.
A copy of the current object.
